title: Nexus One
summary: The Nexus One (codenamed HTC Passion)[9] is an Android smartphone designed and manufactured by HTC as Google's first Nexus smartphone. The Nexus  became available on January 5, 2010, and features the ability to transcribe voice to text, an additional microphone for dynamic noise suppression, and voice guided turn-by-turn navigation to drivers.[10][11][12][13][14]
